Introduction



Auto Click / Auto Fill Extension is like a utility extension which helps user to click / fill on any website with by providing few information about the site and the button which they want to click.



Auto Click / Auto Fill extension consist of 4 major parts Configuration List, Configure, Batch, Action with extra added configuration such as Settings, Addon.



There are two version of extension




  
    

      LITE / Simple
      PRO / Advance
    

  
  
    

      Configuration List<ul><li>Add</li><li>Remove</li></ul>
      Configuration List<ul><li>Add</li><li>Remove</li></ul>
    

    

      Configuration<ul><li>Enable/Disable</li><li>URL</li><li>Refresh</li></ul>
      Configuration<ul><li>Enable/Disable</li><li>URL</li><li>Refresh</li></ul>
    

    

      Action<ul><li>XPath</li><li>Value</li><li>Add</li><li>Remove</li></ul>
      Action<ul><li>XPath</li><li>Value</li><li>Add</li><li>Remove</li><li>Repeat & R-Interval</li><li>Init Wait</li></ul>
    

    

      Addon<ul><li>XPath</li><li>Condition</li><li>Value</li></ul>
      Addon<ul><li>XPath</li><li>Condition</li><li>Value</li></ul>
    

    

      Settings<ul><li>Check iFrame</li><li>Extension Load</li><li>Retry & Retry Interval</li><li>Error Handling</li><li>Export & Import</li></ul>
      Settings<ul><li>Check iFrame</li><li>Extension Load</li><li>Retry & Retry Interval</li><li>Error Handling</li><li>Export & Import</li></ul>
    

    

      Â 
      Batch<ul><li>Start Time</li><li>Init Wait</li><li>Repeat & R-Interval</li></ul>
    

  




Lite Version


Lite version is not limited its simpler version off extension where you just need to take care of XPath and value.






Pro Version


Pro version is advanced version where you can perform advance functionality like repeat, start time, init wait
